translation.en: [young man] I didn't really have your typical upbringing.
I mean, I did at first, but then the world ended.
translation.it: Cioè, all'inizio sì, ma poi il mondo è finito.

translation.en: I don't think anyone was really shocked.
We always thought it might, and then it just finally happened.
translation.it: Temevamo potesse succedere e così è stato.

translation.en: But how it happened, now that's where it gets interesting.
translation.it: È il modo in cui è successo che è interessante.

translation.en: Yep, an asteroid heading straight for Earth.
translation.it: Sì, un asteroide diretto verso la Terra.

translation.en: I know. So obvious.
So, humanity came together, and we did what we do best.
translation.it: L'umanità ha deciso di fare ciò che sa fare meglio.

translation.en: We shot a bunch of rockets at it! And we blew it up! And it was great!
translation.it: Gli abbiamo lanciato contro dei razzi! È stato grande!

translation.en: But it wasn't. You see, the thing that makes rockets rockets--
translation.it: Ma sapete cosa c'era dentro a quei razzi?

translation.en: chemical compounds, a lot of 'em.
Which rained back down on us, and everything changed.
translation.it: Ci sono ricadute addosso. Ed è cambiato tutto.

translation.en: And by "everything," I mean cold-blooded creatures.
translation.it: "Tutto" significa le creature a sangue freddo.

translation.en: And by "changed," I mean mutated and started eating us to death.
translation.it: Che sono mutate e hanno iniziato a divorarci.

translation.en: Ants, lizards, roaches, crocodiles. You name it. There's a lot of 'em.
translation.it: Formiche, lucertole, scarafaggi, coccodrilli... Di tutto un po'.

translation.en: I knew this one kid who was eaten in his sleep by a goldfish he won at a carnival.
translation.it: Un bambino è stato divorato nel sonno dal suo pesce rosso.

translation.en: -[growls] -Man, Todd loved that goldfish.
translation.it: Un bambino è stato divorato nel sonno dal suo pesce rosso. Todd adorava quel pesce rosso.

translation.en: And that cat.
So, for most of human history, if you wanted to kill a cockroach,
translation.it: In passato, se volevi uccidere uno scarafaggio

translation.en: all you needed was a shoe.
Well, suddenly you needed a shotgun.
And sometimes even a tank.
And sometimes even that doesn't work.
Especially if you don't stay in the tank, Bob.
translation.it: Specie se esci dal carrarmato, Bob.

translation.en: Eventually, the really big ones and our military took each other out.
translation.it: Le creature più grosse e l'esercito si sono eliminati a vicenda.

translation.en: We lost 95% of the human population in about a year.
translation.it: Abbiamo perso il 95% della popolazione in un anno.

translation.en: That's a lot of Bobs.
And a lot of Todds.
Those of us who survived, we hid anywhere we could--
translation.it: I sopravvissuti, come me, si sono nascosti dove potevano.

translation.en: bunkers, caves, panic rooms, all around the world.
translation.it: In bunker, caverne, panic room in tutto il mondo.

translation.en: So for the last seven years I've been living in an underground bunker.
translation.it: Sono sette anni che vivo in un bunker sotterraneo.

translation.en: It's not-- It's not as bad as it sounds. Really.
translation.it: Non è poi così male, sul serio.

translation.en: It's a great group of people, and we all love each other.
translation.it: Siamo un bel gruppo e ci vogliamo bene.

translation.en: It's kinda what I imagined college would have been like.
translation.it: È un po' come mi immaginavo il college.

translation.en: -[panting] -[woman] Are you sure he's asleep?
[man] Who?
-[woman] Joel. Who else? -[man] Yeah. He's asleep.
translation.it: - Joel. Chi altro? - Certo che dorme.

translation.en: -[woman] Hang on. Shh. -[man] He's not awake.
-[woman] Are you sure? -It's just you.
[woman] I just-- I don't…
[man] Joel. Joel.
[whispering] See? He's not awake.
-It's just you. -[woman sighs]
[Joel] Dear Aimee, I am wide awake.
I've just gotten good at not really moving or breathing.
translation.it: Ma ho imparato a restare immobile senza respirare.

translation.en: Being stuck in a survival bunker
with a bunch of people who have all found their soul mate is less than ideal.
translation.it: dove tutti hanno trovato l'anima gemella non è il massimo.

translation.en: Karen and Ray got together a few months ago,
translation.it: Karen e Ray stanno insieme da pochi mesi,

translation.en: so they're still kinda in their honeymoon phase.
translation.it: sono ancora in fase luna di miele.

translation.en: -[Karen, Ray continue moaning] -It is super physical.
Good for them, you know. They're both very attractive and apparently quite flexible.
translation.it: Buon per loro. Sono entrambi molto belli ed estremamente atletici.

translation.en: Hey, life's short. Especially down here.
translation.it: Beh, la vita è breve. Specie qui sotto.

translation.en: -Oh. Hey, Ava. -[Ava] Hey, Joel.
-[man] Joel. How's it going? -It's going good, Tim.
translation.it: - Joel. Come va? - Tutto ok, Tim.

translation.en: -How are you-- How are you doing? -[Tim] Yeah, good.
[Joel] Cool.
-I couldn't sleep. -[Ava] Yeah, we know the feeling.
translation.it: - Non riuscivo a dormire. - Ti capisco.

translation.en: Yeah. Probably not for the same reasons.
translation.it: Dubito sia per lo stesso motivo.

translation.en: You guys's, uh, door's open. Is that-- Did you know that?
translation.it: La porta è aperta. È... Lo sapevi?

translation.en: -[Ava] Yeah. -[Tim] Yeah, we know.
Okay.
[Joel] After Tim's parents were eaten by termites,
translation.it: Dalla morte dei genitori di Tim,

translation.en: he and Ava became inseparable.
Okay. Good night.
-In every way. -[both] Night.
That's the asteroid they named 616 Agatha.
And these are all the chemical bombs they sent up to try and…
translation.it: E queste sono le bombe chimiche che hanno sparato...

translation.en: [Joel] So, pretty much everyone's coupled up down here.
Our first baby was born last winter. It was super emotional.
translation.it: L'inverno scorso è nato il primo bambino. È stato emozionante.

translation.en: Welcome to the apocalypse, kid.
The food sucks. At least you'll never know what you're missing.
translation.it: Il cibo fa schifo, ma almeno non sai cosa ti perdi.

translation.en: Kala and Connor got together after Carol died.
translation.it: Kala e Connor si sono messi insieme dopo la morte di Carol.

translation.en: Carol was a cow who ate a box of laundry detergent.
translation.it: Carol era una mucca che si è mangiata del detersivo.

translation.en: -And now we only have one cow. -[cow mooing]
translation.it: Ora ci resta una mucca sola.

translation.en: Her name's Gertie.
Gertie is great.
Gertie's not our only food source.
We have a hunting party that brings back whatever they can from the surface.
translation.it: Un gruppo di noi va a caccia in superficie.

translation.en: It was easier in the beginning, you know, before we ran out of bullets.
translation.it: Era più facile all'inizio, prima che finissimo i proiettili.

translation.en: Facing down one of those things with a janky handmade weapon
translation.it: Affrontare uno di quei cosi con un'arma raffazzonata

translation.en: is no walk in the park.
Or so they tell me. I-I don't go on the hunting parties.
translation.it: O almeno così mi dicono. Io non vado a caccia.

translation.en: They need me in the kitchen. I'm kinda the… -[chopping] -…the chef of the bunker.
translation.it: Hanno bisogno di me in cucina. Sono lo chef del bunker.

translation.en: Everyone likes my minestrone.
Being the only single person in the bunker has its perks too.
translation.it: Essere l'unico single nel bunker ha i suoi vantaggi.

translation.en: I get to hang out with Mavis.
Of course, she's not much for conversation anymore.
translation.it: Anche se non ama più fare conversazione.

translation.en: Her core battery's shot, just like every other Mavis, I'd imagine.
translation.it: Ha la batteria scarica, come tutte le altre Mav1s.

translation.en: Actually never seen a working one.
[Joel] Sure wish you were here, Aimee.
I'd love for you to meet everyone.
[Joel] Oh, yeah.
Maybe we could do a little target practice together.
It's kinda my thing.
Well…
-Sorry, Mavis. -[Gertie moos]
[Connor] Hustle, hustle, people. We gotta move.
[grunting] Guys!
Guys! I got the weapons.
-Stay. -What?
-Get what you need, and let's go. -What's happening? What's going on?
translation.it: - Prendi ciò che ti serve e andiamo. - Che succede?

translation.en: -[Connor] We're breached. -Breached?
-Joel. -What do you mean?
-Like inside-the-bunker breached? -That's what "breached" means, kiddo.
translation.it: - Nel bunker? - E dove se no?

translation.en: [whispers] Breached.
Anna Lucia and I will engage. Anderson and Tim, flank us.
translation.it: Anna Lucia ed io andiamo a vedere. Anderson e Tim, copriteci.

translation.en: Flank 'em, yeah, okay. Where do you guys need me? The rear, or--
translation.it: Certo, copriteli. Dove mi volete? Dietro o...

translation.en: -I thought we were past this, Joel. -Past what? You need help. I can help.
translation.it: - Ne abbiamo già parlato, Joel. - Posso aiutarvi.

translation.en: -Let me help. -You gonna make me say it?
translation.it: - Vi aiuto. - Vuoi proprio che lo dica?

translation.en: -Say what? -You can't handle it, Joel.
translation.it: - Cosa? - Non ce la puoi fare.

translation.en: -You're shook. -Okay, yeah.
-So, you guys don't get scared ever? -[Connor] We get scared.
translation.it: - Voi non ne avete? - Certo che sì.

translation.en: [Tim] We all get scared, Joel, but you get really scared.
-We're not trying to make you feel bad. -We love you, Joel.
translation.it: - Non per infierire. - Ti vogliamo bene.

translation.en: [Connor] But you're unsafe.
-[Tim] You're a liability. -Even on supply runs.
translation.it: - In tutto. - Anche a fare provviste.

translation.en: Okay, why did that speech feel so rehearsed?
-Connor. -[device beeps]
Okay, 30 meters out. Let's move.
-Be careful, Connor-Bear. -I will, Kala-Bee.
[Connor] Load out.
Go with them.
[Karen] They're getting close.
-[gasps] -[Ava] Shit.
[Karen whispers] Oh, my God.
-[Anderson] It got one of 'em. -[Karen] What about the others?
translation.it: - Ne ha uno. - E gli altri?

translation.en: They're coming back.
They need help. I'm going.
translation.it: - Joel! - Gli serve aiuto. Io vado.

translation.en: [Kala] Joel! Wait!
-[whispering] Connor? -[faint groan]
Did I shoot it, or did you?
What do you think?
You.
[Joel] Oh, and I have a pretty severe freezing problem.
But I am working on it.
-[woman whispers] How is it looking? -I think it looks really good.
-Does it look like me? -Yeah.
Are you sure that this pose looks natural?
translation.it: Sicura che sia una posa naturale?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah?
I think it's really good.
What are you doing? Don't move.
-Will you let me see it? -Don't-- Don't move. Aimee.
-I really wanna see it. -[growls]
[laughs] Can I see it?
Okay.
Okay.
-Ready? -Mm-hmm.
[Joel] What do you think?
Why do I have a beard? [snickers]
No, that's shading. I did the shading.
My head is-- is so large.
-You have a big head. -And my hand is so tiny.
translation.it: - Beh, è grande. - E ho una mano minuscola.

translation.en: You have tiny hands.
I love it. I frickin' love it.
-That's super sweet, 'cause it's terrible. -[Aimee laughs]
-I got you something too. -What?
translation.it: - Ho una cosa per te. - Cosa?

translation.en: I don't know if these are the right ones.
translation.it: Non so se siano quelle giuste.

translation.en: No way. These are the ones that I-I-I wanted to get.
translation.it: Non ci credo. Sono proprio quelle che volevo.

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
-What's happening right now? -Uh--
-Are you okay? -Yeah, I'm dancing with my shoulders.
translation.it: - Stai bene? - Sì, ballo con le spalle.

translation.en: -Oh, yeah. -Oh, yeah.
This has been the best summer of my life.
translation.it: È stata l'estate più bella della mia vita.

translation.en: Mine too.
What are you doing?
-Do you know what time it is? -Uh, I think it's, like, 6:30.
translation.it: - Sai che ore sono? - Saranno tipo le 6:30.

translation.en: Aimee, you're-- you're scaring Crocodile Carl.
Okay, look away, Crocodile Carl.
Oh. Look away. Hey, I get it.
-[Aimee giggles] -I get it.
We need to go.
I'm scared.
[Joel] Dear Aimee, This week has been especially shitty.
translation.it: Cara Aimee, questa settimana è stata una merda.

translation.en: We lost Connor to what looked like a really big ant.
translation.it: Abbiamo perso Connor per colpa di una formica gigante.

translation.en: Helps me to draw them.
I try to capture their essence,
scribble down some notes on how to kill them.
translation.it: e mi segno qualche idea su come ucciderli.

translation.en: Sometimes I think it's the only way I know how to cope with these things.
translation.it: È il mio modo per andare avanti.

translation.en: -[switch clicks] -This is 7045. Come in, 3022.
-I repeat, come in, 3022. Over. -[switch clicks]
[woman] This is 3022. What is it now, Ray?
Hey, Janice. No, it's actually-- It's, uh, Joel.
-[chuckles] Oh. Joel. -Yeah.
All right. Hold on one second.
Aimee, it's Ray!
It's Joel. Thanks, Janice.
-[Aimee] Joel! Hey! -Hey, Aimee! Hi!
-How are you? -Hi. Yeah, I, uh-- I'm good.
translation.it: - Come stai? - Ciao. Sì, tutto a posto.

translation.en: -It's so good to hear your voice. -I'm so sorry.
translation.it: - È bello sentire la tua voce. - Mi dispiace tanto.

translation.en: I heard on the open frequency that one of you guys got killed.
translation.it: Ho sentito alla radio che uno di voi è stato ucciso.

translation.en: Yeah. Breached the bunker.
Wow. Actually got inside?
Yeah. It's the first time it's happened. It was kinda scary.
translation.it: Non era mai successo. È stato spaventoso.

translation.en: Did you have to fight it too?
Yeah. Yeah, a little. I had to fight it a little bit.
Actually got super ripped since the last time you saw me, so--
Oh. Wow! [giggles] Super ripped, huh?
Yeah, I was kidding. I'm not super ripped. That was just a bad joke.
translation.it: No, scherzavo. Non li ho i muscoli. Era una pessima battuta.

translation.en: Well, I'm glad you're okay.
translation.it: Sono felice che tu stia bene.

translation.en: Thanks. Yeah.
I am still kinda blown away that you were even able to find my colony on this thing.
translation.it: Non ci credo che sei riuscito a trovare la mia colonia.

translation.en: I know. It's pretty crazy.
'Cause I found it on the first one. What are the odds?
translation.it: E al primo colpo. Quante probabilità ci sono?

translation.en: -[both chuckle] -[Aimee] Crazy.
Yeah. No, I-I called-- I called, like, 90.
Hey, you know what I, uh-- know what I wish sometimes?
What?
That I could, like, s-snap my fingers and be back in that car with you.
translation.it: Vorrei potrei schioccare le dita e tornare in quella macchina con te.

translation.en: Man, that'd be nice.
Yeah. Too bad it's, uh…
you know, impossible.
Kinda feels like everything is impossible these days.
translation.it: Ora come ora, qualsiasi cosa sembra impossibile.

translation.en: Taking care of this whole colony is exhausting.
translation.it: Occuparsi di questa colonia è estenuante.

translation.en: I, uh-- I-I write you letters.
Really?
Yeah. Yeah, I-I write you letters sometimes.
-Aw! -All the time.
I'd love to read 'em.
-Really? I would love to read them to-- -[static surges, stops]
-No. Aimee? -[switches clicking]
-Aimee? -[static buzzing]
[Joel] We've lost a lot of people over the years.
You'd think you'd get numb to it after a certain point.
translation.it: Avrei pensato di abituarmici, dopo un po'.

translation.en: You don't.
-I'm sorry. -Thank God! Where have you been, Joel?
translation.it: - Scusa. - Grazie a Dio! Dov'eri finito?

translation.en: We have to go right now. Say your goodbyes, get in the car.
translation.it: Dobbiamo andare. Saluta e sali in macchina.

translation.en: -I should go. -Maybe you should come with us.
translation.it: - Meglio che vada. - Vieni con noi.

translation.en: -No, my mom is waiting. I'm sorry. -[creature roaring]
Get in the car! Aimee, you need to hurry home now!
translation.it: Sali in macchina! Aimee, torna a casa!

translation.en: -I want you to have this. -What? This is Crocodile Carl.
It's your good luck charm.
-Be careful. -You too.
I love you.
I love you too.
I'm gonna come find you.
You better.
[Aimee's voice] You better.
[Anna Lucia] I wanna know how it got in.
[Ray] It appears to have ripped through one of our perimeter defenses.
translation.it: Ha sfondato una delle nostre difese perimetrali.

translation.en: [Ava] It ripped through steel?
[Tim] Anderson and I resealed the breach point and vent.
translation.it: Anderson e io abbiamo riparato tutto.

translation.en: -Nothing's getting in that way again. -But why did it happen?
translation.it: - Non succederà di nuovo - Ma com'è successo?

translation.en: It was a freak occurrence. There's no reason to think it'll happen again.
translation.it: Era impossibile prevederlo. Non accadrà di nuovo.

translation.en: -[Ray] We should try to stay calm. -[all arguing]
-How far away is Aimee's colony? -[arguing stops]
translation.it: Quanto dista la colonia di Aimee?

translation.en: -What? -Aimee's colony.
-How far away is it? -About 85 miles.
translation.it: - Quanto dista da qui? - Circa 150 km.

translation.en: -How long does that take to get there? -You're not actually thinking of going?
translation.it: - Quanto ci vuole per arrivarci? - Non penserai di andarci?

translation.en: Tim, just… humor me.
-How long? -Seven days.
Minimum.
An armed and trained hunting party would be lucky to last 50 miles on the surface.
translation.it: Una squadra armata e addestrata non durerebbe più di 80 km.

translation.en: But you, Joel…
All right, now I need volunteers
to help reinforce some of the outer perimeter.
-[Anna Lucia] Yeah, I'm gonna go. -[all chattering]
-Ava's got this. -[Karen] Exactly.
I'm gonna go.
It's an impossible journey, Joel.
No, I'm serious.
I love you guys, but there's one person in this world
translation.it: Vi voglio bene, ma solo una persona al mondo mi ha reso davvero felice

translation.en: who ever truly made me happy,
translation.it: ma solo una persona al mondo mi ha reso davvero felice

translation.en: and she's only 85 miles away.
translation.it: ed è a 150 km da qui.

translation.en: And I'm gonna go see her.
That felt awesome.
[Joel] Dear Aimee, I am done hiding.
translation.it: Cara Aimee, sono stufo di nascondermi.

translation.en: I'm done waiting for things to get better.
translation.it: E aspettare che le cose migliorino.

translation.en: It's time to take matters into my own hands.
translation.it: È ora di prendere in mano la situazione.

translation.en: Time to let someone else make the minestrone.
translation.it: Ci penserà qualcun altro al minestrone.

translation.en: I'm taking a radio, even though it doesn't have power.
translation.it: Mi porto una radio, anche se non ha le pile.

translation.en: But I'm gonna take it anyway.
-Wish me luck, Gertie. -[Gertie moos]
Mavis, take care of her.
You're not joking, are you?
Nope. Nope, I'm not.
He's not joking.
We're not letting you leave, Joel. You're needed here.
translation.it: Non ti lasceremo andare, Joel. C'è bisogno di te.

translation.en: Tim, no, I'm not. Come on. I don't do anything.
translation.it: Tim, non è vero. Andiamo. Io non faccio niente.

translation.en: Joel, that's not true. You fix the radio. You make the minestrone.
translation.it: Non è vero. Stai alla radio e prepari il minestrone.

translation.en: [exhales] Okay. Doesn't sound as important when I say it out loud.
translation.it: Ok. So che non sembra importante.

translation.en: I appreciate you trying. Really, I do.
I just don't feel like I belong anywhere.
translation.it: Ma non so dove sia il mio posto.

translation.en: I don't really wanna die all alone at the end of the world, so…
translation.it: E non voglio morire da solo, quando il mondo finirà.

translation.en: Look, I know you guys all just think of me as, like, some little, pathetic,
translation.it: Lo so che mi considerate un piccolo, adorabile,

translation.en: adorable hedgehog.
But I can take care of myself.
translation.it: Ma so badare a me stesso.

translation.en: I'm actually probably a lot stronger than you might think.
translation.it: E sono più forte di quanto pensiate.

translation.en: -We made you a map. -Thanks, Karen.
translation.it: - Ti abbiamo fatto una cartina. - Grazie, Karen.

translation.en: Just… take care.
Everything will try to kill you.
Be observant. Use the advantages that you have.
translation.it: Occhi aperti. Usa tutti i vantaggi che hai.

translation.en: -You're fast and small, so… -Right.
-Don't fight. -Don't fight.
Just run and hide.
Thanks, Ray.
You're an asshole if you get eaten.
translation.it: Se ti mangiano, sei uno stronzo.

translation.en: -Okay. -Nice.
I love you guys. Tell Aimee I'll see her in seven days.
translation.it: Vi adoro. Dite ad Aimee che sarò lì tra una settimana.

translation.en: -[Anderson] We believe in you. -[Tim] Love you, buddy.
translation.it: - Noi crediamo in te. - Ti voglio bene.

translation.en: Where am I?
Well, it's not super useful.
Okay, well, you know what? We know we gotta head west. Right?
translation.it: Ok, beh, devo andare verso ovest.

translation.en: So, let's just… do that.
Start with something easy. West.
Nope, it's this way. West is this way.
translation.it: No. L'ovest è da questa parte.

translation.en: Shit.
Split the difference. Go this way.
Done. First decision made.
[Joel] Dear Aimee, I am doing it.
I'm really doing it!
Honestly, I thought it'd be way worse. So far, it's not too bad.

translation.en: I've seen a lot of signs of death, but no actual death.

translation.en: So, cross your fingers.
Monster eggs.
Trying to stay positive.
Weather's nice. Getting some fresh air. What else can I tell ya?

translation.en: Cool.
-Wham-O-- -[creatures chirping]
-[wings fluttering] -No.
-[branches snapping] -Run and hide.
Hide in the house. Hide in the house.
No, no, no. No!
-[barking continues] -[grunts] No! No, no, no! [screaming]
-[growling] -Yes! Bite it! Bite it off!
Wait. Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait!
Where are you going?
Whoa, that was so cool.
Nice place.
-Can I sit? -[whines]
Thanks.

-[whines] -Yeah. Me too.
-Boy? -[grunts]
Is that your name? Boy? Your name is Boy.
I'm Joel.
Nice to meet ya.
Thanks, uh… Thanks for saving my life, Boy.

Oh. Oh. Oh. Oh. Sorry.
Okay, I won't touch it again.
Was that your owner's?
It's okay. You don't have to talk about it.

translation.en: Sorry.
Wait. Did you think I was her?
I'm gonna lie down too. Is that o--

translation.en: No, it's okay. Just my backpack.
You know, I had a girl, too, once.
Think you would've really liked her. You guys would totally get along.
translation.it: Ti sarebbe piaciuta. Sareste andati d'accordo.

translation.en: She loves dogs. I mean, all animals. She's a big animal lover.
translation.it: Adora i cani. Anzi, adora tutti gli animali.

translation.en: I haven't seen her in seven years.
translation.it: Ma non la vedo da sette anni.

translation.en: Long time. That's why I'm trying to go find her.
translation.it: È tanto tempo. Quindi vado a cercarla.

translation.en: I haven't told anyone this, but I'm kinda nervous about it.
translation.it: Non l'ho detto a nessuno, ma sono nervoso.

translation.en: Good night, Boy.
Weakness: dogs.
That's you.

Going west.
To the coast. Jenner Beach.

You guys want me to come, I'll come.
Come on.

in a second.

sure your girl's worth it?
Coming all this way?
Yeah.
Yeah, she is.
[Minnow] Don't settle, Joel.

You get a hot meal or a good night's sleep.

translation.en: -Not both. -Not both.
translation.it: - Non entrambe le cose. - Non entrambe.

translation.en: Are you being serious?
Something will have smelled our food and be all over this camp within the hour.

translation.en: I can't tell you everything, man. Keep up.

translation.en: "Roar! I'm gonna kill you, Joel Dawson! I'm gonna eat you like broccoli!"

translation.en: "I'm Joel, and I can't protect my girlfriend

translation.en: because I'm useless and insecure and an awkward little teenager."
translation.it: perché sono un ragazzino inutile, insicuro e imbranato."

translation.en: "But I need you to save me! I thought you loved me."
"But I can't because--" [sputtering, shrieking]
-What? -That's your girlfriend dying.
translation.it: - Cos'era? - La tua ragazza che muore.

translation.en: -What? -A needle through water.
A needle through water. Needle through water.
Whoo-hoo-hoo-hoo! Yes! See? Bull's-eye!
Got yourself an admirer there, huh?
Hey, we gotta get going.
Uh, okay. Come on. Come on. We gotta go. We--

Like lesson three: Don't take shortcuts.

translation.en: -[Minnow laughs] See? -[Clyde] Pretty good.
Lesson ten: Keep your socks dry. That's a great one.

translation.en: I'm kinda struggling with lesson two: Not both. That one is not great.

translation.en: [Clyde] Not both. Not both.
-[clap] -Come on, Joel. Not both.

translation.en: I'm super tired.
All right, a lot of things out here you shouldn't touch or eat,

translation.en: but, uh, ferns like these have an antivenom.
translation.it: ma queste felci contengono un antidoto.

translation.en: Good in a pinch for snakes, slugs.
translation.it: Serve per i morsi di serpenti e lumache.

translation.en: -Great entry for your book. -[Joel] Yep, got it.
The insect-looking ones got no peripheral vision.
translation.it: Gli insettoni non hanno visione periferica.

translation.en: No peripheral-- Ah!
The lizard-looking ones can't climb for shit.
The amphibian-looking ones like to hide, lure ya in, eat ya whole.
translation.it: I mega-anfibi si nascondono, poi ti mangiano tutto intero.

translation.en: -[grunts] -Then there are the Sandgobblers.
Those guys are badasses.
Badasses!
Yeah, I know. I fell into their hole.
translation.it: Lo so. Ero nella loro tana.

translation.en: What you saw were worker bees.
What you wanna avoid under all circumstances is a queen.

Well, your first clue would be a giant fin slicing through the earth,

translation.it: che segue ogni tuo suono e vibrazione.

…as you're being ripped in half will be your second.

Come with us. Strength in numbers, you know?

translation.en: No, I think so, too. I just, uh--
It's just something I gotta do. It's not fair.

translation.en: Wh-- Hey. Wha--
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. Whoa, whoa. What's going on?

'Cause this girl, she means a lot to me. You know?

-[laughs] What? -Yeah.
-[giggles] -Yeah, it's lip--

Aimee's gonna love you.

-[laughs] Yeah. -[Joel chuckles]

You're gonna be okay.

Coming all this way?

-My name is Joel. -Hello, Joel.
I am so pleased to meet you.
My name is Mavis.
But if you were to write it out,

You are familiar with the Mav1s line. Delightful!

But if you were to write it out,
you would write it with a 1 and not an I.

Amazing.
Joel, besides conversing with me, for which I am eternally grateful,

Is there anything I can do to assist you

I would be honored to donate my remaining power to you

translation.en: if it would help you with your quest for Aimee with one I and two E's.

-It's working. -Hooray!
-[Aimee] Joel? -Aimee! Hey. Hey.

translation.en: Wh-- Aimee? Aimee? Aimee?
Shit.
My battery has automatically shut down

translation.it: per preservare gli ultimi 15 minuti di carica.

translation.en: Yeah. I hadn't, either.

translation.en: -There you go. -Is something troubling you, Joel?

translation.en: You can tell me anything, as I am an empathetic listener.

translation.en: Also, my memory banks will be permanently erased in 14 minutes.

translation.en: You know? And you're so sure of it.

translation.en: And… right when you're about to cross the finish line,

I think it's romantic.
Right, see? Yeah, okay, you get it.
Romantic, that's what-- Yeah.
Do not give up on your quest, Joel.

translation.en: implied by your journey

translation.en: Thanks, Mav1s.

five!

Homemade.

-Royal Australian Navy. -Oh, dear God.
Retired, of course. My mates call me Cap. How you doing, man?

translation.it: - Hai rubato del cibo? - No, non ho rubato del cibo. - Perché me lo chiedono tutti? - È qui per amore.

translation.en: Good on ya, mate. That's beautiful.
There is no mission more admirable than love.
Every sailor worth his salt knows that.

Uh, I was gonna just, if you--

It's crazy.
Pretty nice here, you know.

translation.en: Yeah.
Hey, Aimee?

translation.en: and so I'm just…
checkin' in.

I think it's the most romantic thing anyone's ever done.

translation.en: from the stress of running this colony.

translation.en: Yeah.

translation.en: From Fairfield.

and he meant a lot to me.

and we'd be happy.

Come with you-- Uh, on the… yacht?

translation.en: Food, water, supplies, medicine.
We greatly appreciate it.
It will see us through to the next helpless colony down the coast.

-You're right. -[man] Yeah.

Um, it was really cool to just-- to see you in action,

translation.en: -Oh. -I'm so glad you came.

Yeah.

Here, uh…
-No, I can't take that. You need it. -No, no, no.

take this trip.

[Joel] My name is Joel Dawson.
I'm 24 years old, and I survived seven days on the surface.

translation.en: Twice, actually.
-Joel? -Joel?
-[chattering, gasping] -You guys! Hey!
-Oh, my God! -Hey, hey, hey!
I'm alive because of the generosity of a few strangers
translation.it: Sono vivo grazie alla generosità di alcuni estranei

translation.en: and the kindness of a great dog.
translation.it: e alla bontà di un cane straordinario.

translation.en: My colony and I are headed to the mountains.
translation.it: La mia colonia ed io andremo sulle montagne.

translation.en: There's supposed to be less monsters there.
And don't get me wrong. The surface is a dangerous place.
translation.it: Non fraintendetemi, là fuori è pieno di pericoli.

translation.en: But I don't think hiding underground is the answer anymore.
translation.it: Ma non credo che nascondersi sottoterra sia la risposta.

translation.en: There is a great big, beautiful, inspiring world out there.
translation.it: C'è tutto un mondo fantastico, bello e stimolante, là fuori.

translation.en: [on radio] And I know you think it might be impossible, but it's not.
translation.it: E so che pensate che sia impossibile, ma non lo è.

translation.en: If I can survive out here, anybody can.
translation.it: Se ce l'ho fatta io, può farcela chiunque.

translation.en: It's like a good friend once told me.
translation.it: Come mi ha detto un caro amico,

translation.en: Good instincts are earned by making mistakes.
translation.it: l'istinto si affina facendo degli errori.

translation.en: If you're lucky enough to survive a few mistakes,
translation.it: Se hai la fortuna di sopravvivere,

translation.en: you're gonna do all right out here.
In this recording, you'll find everything I know about our new world.
translation.it: Questa registrazione contiene tutto ciò che so sul nostro nuovo mondo.

translation.en: Most of this I had to learn the hard way.
translation.it: E l'ho imparato sulla mia pelle.

translation.en: Hopefully, it'll make your way a little easier.

translation.en: So, crank open that hatch.
Okay, come on.
[Joel] Breathe some fresh air. Go. Live your life.
translation.it: Respirate aria fresca. E andate a vivere la vostra vita.

translation.en: It won't be easy, but it'll be worth it.

translation.en: I traveled 85 miles to find that what I'd been missing below ground for seven years
translation.it: Ho dovuto fare 150 km per capire che ciò di cui avevo sentito la mancanza

translation.en: was right above my head this whole time.
translation.it: era proprio sopra la mia testa.

translation.en: And it's incredible.
Oh, and one last thing. Don't settle.
You don't have to. Not even at the end of the world.
translation.it: Mai accontentarsi. Neanche alla fine del mondo.

translation.en: Signing off,
[Minnow] "Don't settle"? That's my line.
It's a long journey, kid. I hope you know what you're doing.
